title: Association between early central venous pressure measurement and all-cause mortality in critically ill patients with heart failure: A cohort of 11,241 patients
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Benhui Liang, Yiyang Tang, Qin Chen, Jiahong Zhong, Baohua Peng, Jing Sun, Tingting Wu, Xiaofang Zeng, Yilu Feng, Zaixin Yu, Lihuang Zha
